insights: Created a new TypeScript React component using Material-UI (MUI) for displaying team member information
Implements styled component pattern with custom styling using MUI's styled API
Exports TeamMember interface defining the data structure with id, name, email, avatar, and roles
Component is fully typed with TeamMemberCardProps interface accepting member data, optional onClick handler, and custom sx styling
Uses MUI components: Card, CardContent, Avatar, Typography, Chip, and Box for layout and presentation
Implements conditional rendering for optional email and roles array
Avatar includes fallback PersonIcon when image is not provided

patterns_discovered.description: Used MUI's styled() function to create StyledCard with custom 'clickable' prop, implementing shouldForwardProp to prevent passing non-DOM props
patterns_discovered.benefit: Allows conditional hover and cursor styling based on onClick prop availability

patterns_discovered.description: Card only shows hover effects and cursor pointer when onClick handler is provided
patterns_discovered.benefit: Better UX - users see visual feedback only when interaction is available

patterns_discovered.description: Avatar component uses image source when available, falls back to PersonIcon with default styling
patterns_discovered.benefit: Graceful degradation when avatar image is not provided

patterns_discovered.description: Uses flexbox with flexDirection='column' and alignItems='center' for centered card content
patterns_discovered.benefit: Consistent, professional presentation of team member information

patterns_discovered.description: Email and roles only render if present in the data, using conditional checks
patterns_discovered.benefit: Flexible component that handles incomplete data gracefully

gotchas_discovered.description: Imported Card as MuiCard to avoid naming conflicts with custom StyledCard component
gotchas_discovered.impact: Required explicit import aliasing to prevent confusion between base and styled components

gotchas_discovered.description: Custom 'clickable' prop must be explicitly excluded from DOM with shouldForwardProp to prevent React warnings
gotchas_discovered.impact: Missing this would cause warnings in browser console about invalid HTML attributes

gotchas_discovered.description: Avatar has hardcoded width/height of 64px while PersonIcon inside has fontSize of 32
gotchas_discovered.impact: Proportions must be maintained if these values change in the future

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully created a reusable TeamMemberCard component with MUI styling and flexible configuration options
approach_outcome.implementation_strategy: Used MUI styled components with custom props pattern to create an interactive, well-styled card component that displays team member information with proper TypeScript typing and conditional rendering
approach_outcome.completeness: Component fully implements required functionality: displays member info, avatar with fallback, email display, role badges, and interactive hover state

recommendations.suggestion: Consider adding size variants (small, medium, large) to support different layout contexts
recommendations.rationale: Would increase reusability across different parts of the application

recommendations.suggestion: Add aria-label or role attributes to ensure screen reader compatibility, especially for the avatar and role chips
recommendations.rationale: Currently lacks explicit accessibility markup for semantic meaning

recommendations.suggestion: Consider extracting hardcoded spacing values (mb: 1.5, width: 64, etc.) to theme constants for easier customization
recommendations.rationale: Would make the component more maintainable and themeable

recommendations.suggestion: Consider making roles array required with a default empty array fallback at the component level rather than in the template
recommendations.rationale: Would provide clearer contract with consumers of the component

recommendations.suggestion: Consider memoizing the component with React.memo() if used in lists with many team members
recommendations.rationale: Would prevent unnecessary re-renders when parent component updates but individual member data hasn't changed
